name: Welsh Higher Education Brussels
membership:
European Regions Research Innovation Network
UNILION
goal:
WHEB'S Aim

At Welsh Higher Education Brussels, our aim is to

Promote the interests of the Welsh Higher Education sector in Europe
Build closer links with a wide range of other stakeholders
Facilitate stronger relationships between Welsh Higher Education Institutions (HEIs), European Institutions and Regional Partners from the EU, and beyond
Gain maximum benefit from the Horizon 2020 launch to secure funding and support for world-class research in Wales
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Sport, Youth
